level.text: The Mayor shall issue a deed for the bid off property sold pursuant to § 47-1303.02 to the person whose offer the Mayor accepts.
The deed shall be prima facie evidence of a good and perfect title in fee simple to the bid off property.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-115
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-115, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 43-1303.01.
